title: Remediation of acid rain in surface waters

content.question: An effective short-term remediation strategy for the pond would be to

choices.label: build taller smokestacks downwind from the pond
prevent fertilizer runoff from entering the pond
periodically stock the pond with brown trout
add calcium carbonate to the pond water

content.answer: add calcium carbonate to the pond water
